#Unit:Inch
Global	XS	SM	MD	M LG	LG	L Long	XL	XL Long	XXL	3XL
SizeId	-100	-80	-60	-40	-20	0	20	40	60	80
CHEST	34-36	36-38	38-40	39-41	40-42	40-42	42-44	42-44	44-46	46-48
WAIST	29-31	31-33	33-35	34-36	35-37	35-37	37-39	37-39	39-41	41-44
WEIGHT	125-135	135-150	150-170	155-175	170-190	175-195	190-210	195-215	210-230	230-250
HEIGHT	66	68	70	70.5	71	75	72	76	73	74
InsideLeg	26"	27"	28"	28.5"	29"	31"	30"	32"	31"	31"
